Presented by BMW, the Spartan Kids Race is a fun obstacle race designed specially for kids. 

Come on down to Palawan Green, Sentosa today and cheer on these pint sized warriors, as they crawl, climb, and jump through exciting physical challenges!

5.post_text:
The BMW Pavilion makes its first stop in Asia at the Suntec Plaza, Singapore. 

Experience the BMW M760Li xDrive and the first-ever BMW 6 Series Gran Turismo at The BMW Pavilion this Sunday, 19 November 2017 from 10am – 10pm. We hope to see you there!

comments.message: Jovelyn Tan - I am training hard for the Spartan race

My kid learned to balance on the bicycle (that is cycle without side wheels ) when he was just 3.5 yrs old .He is very courageous and energetic kid.If happen to win a ticket to Spartan kids  Race it will be a good opportunity and experience for him  to face different hurdles and boost his confidence...He likes to do adventurous activities as can be seen..
Father and child are training hard weekly for their future Adventure  challenge . And make them strong enough to spartan challenge.
Dominic is always game on for a challenge! See how he flips! 🐬🦈

The first-ever BMW 6 Series Gran Turismo has arrived in Singapore! The BMW 6 Series Gran Turismo impresses with its unique aesthetics and sports a spacious, comfortable cabin housed in the coupe-styled body of a true performer.

Experience the BMW M760Li xDrive and the first-ever BMW 6 Series Gran Turismo at The BMW Pavilion, Suntec Plaza, on 12 & 19 November 2017, from 10am - 10pm. We hope to see you there.

15.post_text:
Thank you all who participated in the PMGA Golf Tournament, BMW Golf Cup International 2017 Qualification held at Sentosa Golf Club, the Serapong Course on 25 & 26 October 2017!
 
Congratulations to our winners – Ng Choon San for the Mens I Category, Raymond Chee for the Mens II Category, and Sara Lew for the Ladies Category.
 
The winner of each category will be representing us at the esteemed BMW Golf Cup International World Final held in South Africa in March 2018 and we wish them all the best.

Some of the key features include the BMW Gesture Control, which uses context-specific gestures to interact with the 12.3″ Navigation System Professional Display, and enhanced Bluetooth with wireless charging.

Experience it for yourself at 303 Alexandra Road today.

21.post_text:
Charge. Drive. Repeat. Take to the streets with the best of both power sources brought together in perfect harmony for longer drives.

The all-new BMW iPerformance Plug-in Hybrids include the BMW 225xe iPerformance Active Tourer, BMW 330e iPerformance, BMW 530e iPerformance, BMW 740Le xDrive iPerformance, and BMW X5 xDrive40e iPerformance. 

Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to book a test drive today. #BMWiPerformance

22.post_text:
BMW is proud to the Official Car of the Singapore International Energy Week 2017 held at Marina Bay Sands this week.
 
We also displayed the all-new BMW 530e iPerformance as part of our range of BMW iPerformance plug-in hybrids. In the BMW iPerformance models, an efficient combustion engine works in perfect harmony with a powerful electric motor.
 
Experience it for yourself at Performance Motors today.
